All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CommunicationAccess
This class allows to guarantee the uniqueness of the communication instances but also to impose a single access path to them.
CommunicationFactory
This class is responsible for instantiating the correct version of the object in charge of a transmission according to a certain modality.
CommunicationStrategy
Abstract interface describing the public interface of all communication methods.
ComNet
This class returns a message in case of a ComNet message.
ComNetAdaptator
Concrete subclass of the abstract CommunicationStrategy interface.
MailCommunication
Concrete subclass of the abstract CommunicationStrategy interface.
Server
The only public class in the package for now, it is the conductor of the alert service.
SmsCommunication
Concrete subclass of the abstract CommunicationStrategy interface.
Subscriber
This class stores information about a service subscriber via 4 attributes.
TestServer
This class only contains one main demonstrator of correct operation from the alert service.
XmessCommunication
Concrete subclass of the abstract CommunicationStrategy interface.
